    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Dvo dimenzionalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">Two dimensional systems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zweidimensionale Systeme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Systèmes bidimensionnels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistemas bidimensionais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistemi bidimensionali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο διαστατικά συστήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistemas de dos dimensiones</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poenastavitev Coulombovega zakona pri obravnavi vpliva električnega vodnika na električno polje v 2D prostoru.</string>
            <string language="en">Simplification of Coulomb's law and shape of electric field in case of charged wire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">coulombov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">coulomb's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vereinfachung des Gesetzes des Coulombs und Form 
von elektrischem fangen falls von belasteter Leitung auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simplification de la loi du coulomb et forme de 
champ électrique en cas de fil charge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simplificação da lei do coulomb e forma do 
campo elétrico caso que do fio carregado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Semplificazione di legge del coulomb e figura del
campo elettrico nel caso di legare caricato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλοποίηση του νόμου του Coulomb και μορφή του 
ηλεκτρικού πεδίου σε περίπτωση χρεωμένου καλωδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simplificación de la ley del culombio y 
dimensión de una variable del campo eléctrico en caso de que del 
alambre cargado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Coulombs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
